pkgmetadata.longdescription: Composite 'Indicator' Construction and Imputation Data // Different functions includes constructing composite indicators, imputing missing data, and evaluating imputation techniques. Additionally, different tools for data normalization. Detailed methodologies of 'Indicator' package are: OECD/European Union/EC-JRC (2008), "Handbook on Constructing Composite Indicators: Methodology and User Guide", OECD Publishing, Paris, DOI:10.1787/533411815016, Matteo Mazziotta Adriano Pareto, (2018) "Measuring Well-Being Over Time: The Adjusted MazziottaPareto Index Versus Other Non-compensatory Indices" DOI:10.1007/s11205-017-1577-5 and De Muro P., Mazziotta M., Pareto A. (2011), "Composite Indices of Development and Poverty: An Application to MDGs" DOI:10.1007/s11205-010-9727-z.
